#summary URL used to output open tables, bars, and orders in XML format
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =

_{domainname}/device/xmloutput/open_tables_bars_orders.asp?_
This URL is used to output open tables, bars, and orders in XML format

<br>

= Details =

URL parameters are:
{{{
rid : Integer - Restaurant location ID
}}}

=== Example ===
{{{
http://www.mydomainname.com/device/xmloutput/open_tables_bars_orders.asp?rid=2
}}}
